message.name: HTTP_404_FILE_LOCATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified location_id. Please use a valid location_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_BINARY_CONTENTS_FOUND
message.locale: This API should only be used to read resources that include a reference to a file located on an external system. It should not be used to read files that return the actual file contents - another API that deals with binary data is available if required.
